page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: We interviewed 6 people on the Domesday Project. Most of the people are pensioners and some people are farmers. And most of the people travel 12 miles to work. The nearest senior school is in childs Ercall the nearest junior school is in Marketdrayton. The nearest Emergency Hospital is in Shrewsbury.The nearest Doctor is in Hodnet.Shropshire star is the main newspaper. Central is the most popular tv channel. The most amount of videos in family was 1.Most popular radio channel was 2.The highest amount of cars in the family was 2
